2021年度,大学院国際コミュニケーション研究科,Directed Research: International Communications and Culture S　(Marketing Communication and Persuasion),森本　真理子,春学期  日７時限,研究指導（修士課程）,１年以上,0, ,早稲田,5601038027,01,日・英併用,対面,CMMM69ZS,商学,マーケティング,卒業論文/研究、修士/博士論文,修士レベル,演習／ゼミ,False,,"This seminar introduces students to common research methods in social sciences applied to marketing communication, such as a) formulation of questions, b) development of methods that can provide data relevant to the questions, and c) interpretation of the data as answers to the question. Under the supervision of the instructor,students will develop a full research proposal and execute it individually.Students will be introduced to a variety of theories, research designs and methods, both quantitative and qualitative. As part of this seminar students will be exposed to statistical procedures and software/programming commonly used in academic research in marketing.",,,,,,,"
",https://www.wsl.waseda.jp/syllabus/JAA104.php?pKey=5601038027012021560103802756&pLng=jp

Under the supervision of the instructor,students will develop a full research proposal and execute it individually.Students will be introduced to a variety of theories, research designs and methods, both quantitative and qualitative. As part of this seminar students will be exposed to statistical procedures and software/programming commonly used in academic research in marketing.",,,,,,,"
